name: gifted-md
description: I am Gifted-Md WhatsApp MultiDevice Bot built in NodeJs to enhance the experience

SESSION_ID.description: Your session id. Must start with Gifted~

MODE.description: set Mode  to public or private

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot to view status

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Make it true if you want bot to read messages

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want bot to show typing

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Make it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

AUTO_REJECT_CALLS.description: Make it true if you want to automatically reject calls
